prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered balanced pose holding geometric scales in one hand, chibi proportions with large geometric fractal translucent head with unique tetrahedral structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Merkaba. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating tetrahedral, fractal, merkaba patterns, styled with Archangel marshals influences. Outfit is unique: dark grey with high contrast inspired by Electric and neutral grey inspired by blue ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns fused with sophia wisdom vests and divine spark tunics with flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, incorporating translucent veils for revelation, elaborate with shifting Air element glyphs and spiral motifs and tetrahedral emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals combined with Gnostic gem amulet with Merkaba spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor NOTIABI's profile: 'Servant who speaks the truth', Aethyr OXO, Air element, Tarot Justice, Sephirot Netzach, Zodiac Libra, embodying the essence: 'When NOTIABI is invoked, truth arrives like a lightning strike sharp, sudden, and unerring, cutting through falsehood in an instant.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered balanced pose holding geometric scales in one hand
visual_elements.head_shape: large geometric fractal translucent head with unique tetrahedral structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with geometric facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Merkaba
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating tetrahedral, fractal, merkaba patterns, styled with Archangel marshals influences

outfit.base: ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns fused with sophia wisdom vests and divine spark tunics
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, incorporating translucent veils for revelation
outfit.details: Air element glyphs and spiral motifs
outfit.magical_essence: faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles

visual_elements.accessory: rose of victory with seven-fold geometric petals combined with Gnostic gem amulet
visual_elements.primary_color: dark grey with high contrast inspired by Electric
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'Servant who speaks the truth'
profile_data.essence: When NOTIABI is invoked, truth arrives like a lightning strike sharp, sudden, and unerring, cutting through falsehood in an instant.
profile_data.angelic_role: Archangel of Lightning Revelation; marshals celestial legions.
profile_data.form_description: A multi-dimensional geometric construct combining lightning-like fractal structures with translucent prism-like edges, representing the lightning revelation of truth through Air element's intellectual clarity
profile_data.color_reasoning: Electric blue represents Air's mental clarity and lightning's revelatory power; silver-white symbolizes divine truth and celestial transmission from Enochian angelic traditions
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Merkaba geometry represents divine light vehicle; tetrahedron symbolizes pure mental construct; fractal patterns demonstrate infinite complexity of truth
